  cat(paste0("\"", rep("*", j), "\""), "\n")
}

#3.Get an input from the user to print the Fibonacci sequence starting from the 1st input up to 500. Use repeat and break statements.
start <- as.numeric(readline("Enter the number of terms to print in the Fibonacci sequence: "))

if (is.na(start)) {
 cat("Error: Please enter a valid number.\n")
} else {
 a <- 0
 b <- 1

 cat("Fibonacci sequence starts from", start, ":\n")
 cat(start, "")

 repeat {
    nextFib <- a + b
    if (nextFib > start) {
      break
    }
    cat(nextFib, " ")
    a <- b
    b <- nextFib
 }

 cat("\n")
}
